p: Tested bacteria include seven isolates of Escherichia coli ATCC 25922, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853, Micrococcus luteus ATCC 14452, Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213, Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633, Salmonella typhimurium, and Bacillus cereus. Before use, strains were revivified by subcultures in Luria-Bertani (LB) plates at 37Â°C for 24 h.
